channel.title: New XSS challenge
channel.description:
Hey there 0x00sec! ðŸ‘‹
Intigriti just launched a couple days ago a new XSS challenge. This time they are celebrating 5k followers on twitter.
The objective is the same as the last one: try to find a DOM XSS in the following page [challenge.intigriti.io/2](https://challenge.intigriti.io)
The challenge ends May 24th. Among all accepted solutions, a winner will be picked. The prize is the same, you can check it in the link above.
Since this time I have a couple days before the challenge ends, Iâ€™ll try to write the solution and post it here once it finishes.
Hope you enjoy it!
See you around, ~hasp0t
